skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: In the front-end realm, I mastered HTML and CSS, and I'm currently diving into JavaScript for interactivity. Plus, my solid grasp of React lets me create user-friendly interfaces.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: When it comes to UI/UX, I craft seamless designs using Figma, ensuring a smooth user journey. Armed with a strong grasp of color theory, I curate visually appealing experiences. Aesthetics and usability are at the forefront of my design approach.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: In the backend arena, I'm currently in learning mode, starting off with JavaScript and Node.js. Excited to venture into the world of server-side logic and database management to complement my front-end expertise.

portfolio.title: Common CSR Portal
portfolio.description: CSR Hub: A unified platform where companies collaborate and host CSR activities seamlessly! 🤝🌍✨ Organizations can also initiate activities right here.

portfolio.title: WeatherApp
